resources.string: I\'m studying in BTPIT. Chevardova T.M

Students of GBPOU VO \'BTPIT\' by profession A Welder of manual and partially mechanized welding (surfacing), under the guidance of teachers Zavidovskaya N.I., Novokreschenova D.V., took part in the regional scientific and practical student conference \"The future of welding has already come\", organized by GBPOU VO \"VTPST\", which took place from January 22 to February 8 , 2024 .Our students participating in the conference shared their vision of current trends and problems of the welding technology market, shared their experience in organizing efficient welding production in a rapidly changing world. The students\' works describe the processes that are now being introduced into the modern welding industry: automation, robotization, digitalization, online management.
